Producer: Karen Barber, Andrea Sperling, Christina Ricci, Ron Yerxa, Albert Berger
Production Co: United Artists, Pumpkin Productions LLC, American Zoetrope
Sound Mix: Dolby Stereo, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Surround, Dolby SR
Synopsis: Carolyn's (Christina Ricci) sorority sisters set their sights on the Sorority of the Year award and coaching challenged athletes is their ticket to the trophy. But when the queen of formals finds herself mentoring Pumpkin (Hank Harris), a disabled athlete, their two worlds collide.
Title: Pumpkin
